attributes.action: Stop ancient heraldic law from killing Scottish football heritage
attributes.additional_details:
Please see the below stories relating to this issue. This does not just affect Ayr United - YOUR CLUB is in danger too!

http://www.scotsman.com/heritage/people-places/ayr-united-face-legal-action-over-team-badge-1-3952853

http://www.dailyrecord.co.uk/news/scottish-news/ayr-united-face-having-ditch-6861133

http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/football/34882922
attributes.background:
The majority of Scottish football clubs are at risk of being told that their badge breaks ancient heraldic law. 

This petition is to ask for a change in ancient heraldic law to ensure that existing sporting organisations are exempt from outdated legislation - saving thousands of pounds.
